changes.change: Added Big Sur from alt03b1, Filza and SnowBoard SettingsIcons Extension as dependencies

Starting with this release, all stock apps that have a macOS icon
counterpart will use the macOS icon from
Big Sur by alt03b1 except for the following apps:
• Keynote
• Pages
• Numbers
• GarageBand
• iMovie
• Photo Booth

Icons that have been removed:
• App Store
• Books
• Calculator
• Calendar
• Contacts
• Find My
• FaceTime
• Home
• Mail
• Maps
• Messages
• News
• Photos
• Safari
• Settings
• Stocks
• TV
• Voice Memos

Icons that have been updated:
• Music

Icons that have been added:
• Apollo
• Discord
• Filza
• GitHub
• Google Chrome
• Google Maps
• Hulu
• iFile
• Measure
• Netflix
• Patreon
• Reddit
• Spotify for Artists
• Spotify Stations
• Spotify
• Twitch
• Twitter
• YouTube Music
• YouTube
Added preference icons for Safari, Mail and General. Needs SnowBoard SettingsIcons Extension.

This beta release contains 85 icons, all created by me in Sketch 70.
